content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":58669,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/840d4d6e-c05b-4b3e-87eb-d5bc7c07b4d7/eve.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/840d4d6e-c05b-4b3e-87eb-d5bc7c07b4d7/eve.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"eve.PNG\",\"name\":\"eve.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"840d4d6e-c05b-4b3e-87eb-d5bc7c07b4d7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":654,\"height\":133},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Go to our public \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://events.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Events Platform\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and register to the events that interest you. You are encouraged to visit Tech Talks, Meetups, Workshops, Conferences, Town halls, Gatherings and Open days, Hackathons and other exciting events to learn more and enhance your skills.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Keep up with what's new in EPAM events world! On the Events Platform you can find out what interesting events will take place in the near future.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With the Events Platform you will have access to any past, live, or upcoming event details and materials.\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://events.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Browse and join\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"the variety of events organized by EPAM for you, across all locations and offices:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":46123,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/67a61961-6cd8-438d-81e4-f19de39774ca/eve2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/67a61961-6cd8-438d-81e4-f19de39774ca/eve2.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"eve2.PNG\",\"name\":\"eve2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"67a61961-6cd8-438d-81e4-f19de39774ca\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":713,\"height\":194},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
